alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 12:20PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Broward County through 1245 PM EDT... At 1219 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Intersection Krome And U.S. 27, or near Miramar, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pembroke Pines, Miramar, Davie, Miami Gardens, Weston, Cooper City, Royal Palm Ranches, Intersection Krome And U.S. 27, Sunshine Acres, Intersection I-75 And Griffin Road, Miramar Parkway And University Drive and Country Club. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.
